rash.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: if you are rash, you do things too quickly, without thinking carefully about whether they are sensible or not
rash.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Please Jessie, don’t do anything rash.
Don’t go making any rash decisions about your future!
It was rather rash of you to lend them your car.
rash.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: a lot of red spots on someone’s skin, caused by an illness
nappy rash British English,  diaper rash American English
rash.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: She had a nasty rash on her arm.
Most babies get nappy rash at some stage.
a heat rash (=a rash caused by heat)
My mother comes out in a rash if she eats seafood.
